item.title: Prestigious Scientia PhD Scholarship available
item.description: It is my pleasure to announce that applications for the prestigious UNSW Scientia Ph.D. Scholarship Scheme on the project “Using Big Data to Redesign the Health System” are now open. The UNSW Scientia Ph.D. Scholarship Scheme is the most prestigious and generous scholarship scheme at UNSW and it aims to attract the best and brightest people into strategic research areas. Awardees receive a $50,000 scholarship package for four years, comprising a $40,000 per annum tax-free stipend and a travel and development support package of up to $10,000 per annum.
